title: Thin film-based chemical sensors of Carbon Quantum Dots (CQDs)-Dithizone for the specific detection of Lead ions in water resources
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Abstract Lead (Pb2+) toxicity is one of the scourges that pose hazardous and severe risks to human health and the environment globally. Lead toxicity issues can be addressed primarily by...
